item.title: Shelly add a quote by Marion Roach
item.description: "All the action adventure girls have red hair," he said. "Whenever it is an independent girl, not a sidekick person, when she has her own mind or does as good as the guys, she has red hair." -- Marion Roach

item.title: Shelly add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Shelly add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "I like your Christ, I do not like your Christians. Your Christians are so unlike your Christ." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shelly add a quote by Lucy Maud Montgomery
item.description: "Red hair is my life long sorrow." -- Lucy Maud Montgomery

item.title: Shelly add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "Red hair is great. It's rare, and therefore superior." -- Augusten Burroughs

item.title: Shelly add a quote by Lucille Ball
item.description: "Once in his life, every man is entitled to fall madly in love with a gorgeous redhead." -- Lucille Ball

item.title: Shelly add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Shelly add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Shelly add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "When you're in jail, a good friend will be trying to bail you out. A best friend will be in the cell next to you saying, 'Damn, that was fun'." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Shelly add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Mom says it's because she has PMS. Do you even know what that means? "I'm not a little kid anymore. It means pissed-at- men syndrome" -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Shelly add a quote by maya angelou
item.description: "I love to see a young girl go out and grab the world by the lapels. Life's a bitch. You've got to go out and kick ass." -- maya angelou

item.title: Shelly add a quote by Jason Aaron
item.description: "Spider-Man: The Phoenix Force is a crazy powerful cosmic firebird entity that for some reason seems to be attracted to earthbound redheads (I can relate)." -- Jason Aaron
